TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SplitterCancelEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

summary.span: 为拆分器事件提供数据。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#547](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#547)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#547](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#547)]

param.name: mouseCursorX
param.span: 鼠标指针的 X 坐标（在工作区坐标中）。

span.span: The X coordinate of the mouse pointer in client coordinates.

param.name: mouseCursorY

summary.span: 使用鼠标指针和 左上角的指定坐标初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified coordinates of the mouse pointer and the upper left corner of the .

summary.span: 获取鼠标指针的 X 坐标（在工作区坐标中）。

span.span: Gets the X coordinate of the mouse pointer in client coordinates.

value.span: 一个表示鼠标指针的 X 坐标（在工作区坐标中）的整数。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#547](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#547)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#547](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#547)]
